command.question: Show all POST requests to `/cart/add` on `ALU-WEB-PROD-01` in the last 24 hours. Are there any unusual patterns?
command.query: agent.name:"ALU-WEB-PROD-01" AND data.http_method:"POST" AND data.url_path:"/cart/add" AND @timestamp:[2024-05-20T10:10:30.456Z TO 2024-05-21T10:10:30.456Z]

result: [SIMULATION] Wazuh query was sent for execution, but this is a simulation so no data was returned.

command.question: On host `ALU-WEB-PROD-01`, check the parent process of the web server (`w3wp.exe`) at the time of the alert. Was anything else happening around that time?
command.query:
SELECT Name, CommandLine, PPID
FROM processes(host="ALU-WEB-PROD-01")
WHERE Name == "w3wp.exe"
